cleaned_text: For Excessively Damaged Hair The crowd favorite. We like big hair and we cannot lie so we made a treatment that can get you voluminous lift in minutes and without having to damage your bank account too. Our hair mask works hard to infuse volumizing cotton seed oil into the strands to help give you that lift while the aloe vera and ginseng assists in nourishing and hydrating to give you a smoother, happier hair. More details - Cruelty Free - Paraben Free - Paraffin Free
